titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣawe, Lectionary for the first half of the year

donors.donor: Names of many individuals are mentioned in supplication formulas throughout the Ms. always in couples: e.g. ʾabunä Gäbrä Maryam and Wälättä Mikaʾel (s. fols. 5rc, 7rb, 13vb, 15va), Gäbrä Krәstos and Wälättä Tәnśaʾe (s. fols. 6ra, 8va), Täklä Giyorgis and Wälättä Maryam (s. fols. 6rc, 13va), Gäbrä Maryam and Wälättä Krәstos (s. fols. 6vc, 8ra), Gäbrä Ḫәywät and ʿAmätä Śәllase (s. fols. 7ra, 8vc), Gäbrä Śәllase and Wälättä Maryam (s. fols. 7rc, 8rb), Gäbrä Wäldä Gärima and Wälättä ʾƎgziʾ (s. fols. 7va, 8vb), ʾabunä Täklä ʾAb and Wälättä Śәllase (s. fol. 14va).

txstates.txstate: Parchment very crudely prepared. Cuts carefully amended on fols. 13, 44, 49, 50, 76, 78, 82, 105, 112, 137, 144, 183, 190.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish tooled leather; Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (5 tools were used: wave form; simple straight double line fillet; simple cross hatching, double circle, X-form).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches through the spine cover.

squires.squire:
A(4; s.l. 2, stub after 2; 3, stub after 1/fols. 1r-4v) – I(12/fols. 5r-16v) – II፪(8/fols. 17r-24v) – III፫(8/fols. 25r-32v) – IV፬(8/fols. 33r-40v) – V፭(8/fols. 41r-48v) – VI፮(8/fols. 49r-56v) – VII፯(8; s.l. 1, stub after 8; 3, stub after 6; 6, s.l. stub after 3; s.l. 7, stub after 1/fols. 57r-64v) – VIII፰(8/fols. 65r-72v) – IX፱(8; s.l. 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 73r-80v) – X፲(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 81r-88v) – XI፲፩(8; s.l. 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 89r-96v) – XII፲፪(8; s.l. 3, stub after 6; 6, stub after 3/fols. 97r-104v) – XIII፲፫(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 105r-112v) – XIV፲፬(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 113r-120v) – XV፲፭(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 121r-128v) – XVI፲፮(8; s.l. 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 129r-135v) – XVII፲፯(8; s.l. 2, stub after 7; 7, stub after 2/fols. 136r-144v) – XVIII፲፰(8/fols. 145r-152v) – XIX፲፱(8/fols. 153r-160v) – XX፳(8/fols. 161r-168v) – XXI፳፩(8/fols. 169r-176v) – XXII፳፪(8/fols. 177r-184v) – XXIII፳፫(8; s.l. 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 185r-192v) – XXIV፳፬(6; s.l. 2, stub after 5; 5, stub after 2/fols. 193r-198v) – XXV(4/fols. 199r-202v)
Folios in quire XXV of a smaller size.

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. Structural pricks are not visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Names of the donors; incipit of Text I-1; incipit and explicit of sections of Text I-1; incipit of Text I-2; incipit and explicit of sections of Text I-2; titles of books to be read; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals; the word “sälam”; the word “mәsäbak”; the word “mәlṭan”.

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Text I is possibly copied from a printed edition, cp. to the first chapter (kәfәl ʾand) of the Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣawe “Lectionary for the Year”, published in Ṭәrr 15, 1960 E.C. (January 24, 1968 A.D.) in Addis Abäba. - The beginning of Text I-1) was copied twice, cp. fols. 5ra-8vc, 9ra-12vc. - Folios in quire XXV of a smaller size.

extras.extra: - Written on folios of quire A, used as protective folios and sewn upside down, two excerpts from Mäṣḥafä Gәṣṣawe “Lectionary for the Year” as follows: ጥር ፳፱-፴: fols. 2ra-2vc ኅዳር ፳፫-፳፬: fols. 3ra-3vc
